import Mathlib

open Set Filter Topology MeasureTheory

variable {a b : â„}

theorem integral_uniform_limit_mul {f : â„• â†’ â„ â†’ â„} {f_lim g : â„ â†’ â„}
  (hab : a â‰¤ b) (hg : ContinuousOn g (Set.Icc a b))
  (h_unif : âˆ€ Îµ > 0, âˆƒ N, âˆ€ n â‰¥ N, âˆ€ x âˆˆ Set.Icc a b, |f n x - f_lim x| â‰¤ Îµ) :
  Tendsto (fun n => âˆ« x in a..b, (f n x) * g x) atTop (nhds (âˆ« x in a..b, f_lim x * g x)) := by
  sorry
